problem_text:
Problem 13 (4-term APs in uniform sets.). Suppose that A ⊂ Z/NZ has density α and is Fourier uniform (that is, all Fourier coefficients of 1A − α are o(N)). Does A contain at least ≫ α100N 2 4-term arithmetic progressions?
Comments. Gowers [126] has shown that this is not true if 100 is replaced by 4.01. In view of the ‘arithmetic regularity lemma’ it is natural to consider sets A
